Name: Focus Energy
Description: The next attack is guaranteed to be a crit.

Name: Shrapnel Armor
Comments: TODO: Remove when can't cast Reaction. Do not remove otherwise.

Name: Re-Raise
Description: Automatically revive with 25% HP when killed.

Name: Hunter's Mark
Description: Unable to evade the next 3 physical attacks.

Name: Reverse Polarity
Comments: The insane OP properties of this status are balanced by the fact that it wears off on the next turn AND after taking any damage/healing at all. This makes it hard to exploit.

Name: Kneurotoxin
Comments: Important: Make sure that even though this status makes the battler's turn come instantly, they still take the damage-per-turn.

Name: Duel Ready
Description: The next attack is guaranteed to be a crit.

Name: Inner Release
Description: The next 2 attacks are guaranteed to be a crit.
